title: Multicultural Online Learning Environment Design: Mobile Microlearning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory online learning experience and multicultural society awareness
context.additional_context: Mobile-first design optimized for smartphone accessibility, with time-efficient learning modules for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more communication strategies considering cultural differences in online learning
Learners can apply two or more microlearning content design principles for multicultural learner groups
Learners can design a feedback system utilizing formative assessment tools executable in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
